svn commit: samba r22541 - in branches: SAMBA_3_0/source/lib/talloc
	SAMBA_3_0_25/source/lib/talloc SAMBA_4_0/source/lib/talloc
body: 146 (return) [ Orosius composed his history in Africa, only two years after the event; yet his authority seems to be overbalanced by the improbability of the fact. The Chronicle of Marcellinus gives Heraclian 700 ships and 3000 men: the latter of these numbers is ridiculously corrupt; but the former would please me very much.]
